value.title: Announcing the Upcoming Evolution of Power BI Premium to enterprise markets and beyond
value.excerpt: Yesterday was filled with announcements of new capabilities of Power BI Premium and even a per user licensing option to gain access to Premium features. This blog post sums those up so you can prepare for a much better experience of owning and using Power BI Premium.

value.title: Power BI 'new look' updated, close to becoming default experience
value.excerpt: The visual refresh for Microsoft's Power BI service has been updated even further based on user feedback. It will soon be ready to be released as the default experience for all users.

value.title: Power BI Desktop Update - August 2019
value.excerpt: Our August release has another hotly anticipated feature from the Microsoft Business Application Summit, grouping. value.title: Power BI Desktop Update - December 2019
value.excerpt: This December update is packed with several new features! In preview, we have the new Customize theme dialog that allows you to tweak common theme settings without having to write or modify a JSON file! Additionally, we now allow you to export the current theme as a JSON so you can easily share, reuse,

value.title: Power BI Desktop Update - November 2019
value.excerpt: The November update has major updates in several areas of Power BI Desktop. There's a new, modern ribbon that aligns Power BI Desktop with Office and adds more functionality.
